doc.field: Subseries IX.A. Reference files and inventories [RESTRICTED/ unprocessed]
Subseries IX.A. Reference files and inventories [RESTRICTED/ unprocessed]

Subseries IX.A. is currently unprocessed. According to legacy inventories, this series contains a group of reference files organized alphabetically by sport that contain reference material about individual sports, including athletes, history, organizations, and teams, mostly as news article clippings. The subseries also contain video inventories and research reports compiled by the WSF for reference use of their collections. Material dates from 1975 to 2004.
